email_sequence.subject: Why Abbott Collection's top reps are 10x more productive
email_sequence.body:
Hi {{first_name}},

I've noticed a pattern: top furniture reps use tools 10-12 times daily, while bottom performers barely log in.

Without visibility into rep activity, you can't coach the underperformers.

How do you currently track rep productivity?

{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: 27% rep turnover is killing your growth
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

The industry average 27% rep turnover costs Abbott Collection approximately $500K annually in lost relationships and training.

eCat shows exactly which reps need help before they fail.

Worth discussing?

{{sender_name}}

linkedin_sequence.message: Hi {{first_name}}, noticed Abbott Collection works with independent reps. Getting them to adopt new tools must be challenging. We've solved this for 50+ brands.
{{first_name}}, thanks for connecting! Curious - what's your biggest challenge with sales operations right now?

optimization_notes: Moderate pain - focus on education and ROI demonstration
Highlight performance tracking and coaching capabilities
